full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RANG GZHAN GYI DON DU SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN MA 'DI'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,('DI LTAR RNAM RTOG GIS BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BGYI BA 'DI NI, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA RGYAL PO CHEN PO'I RGYAL SRID KYI BLON PO RIN PO CHE, TSE RIGS PA NI @009B STOBS KYIS 'KHOR LO BSGYUR BA CHING GIS RIGS LAS 'BYUNG BA, JANG JONG CHEN PO CHING WANG GI SRAS LNGA PA STAN SRID RIGS PA DANG LDAN PA GUN MTSAN RDO RJE AER KHE AA HA'I DANG, GSO RTZI RIG PA'I BLO GROS RGYAS PA AA CHE THU TAR HANG THO YON CHOS RJE BLO BZANG CHOS SBYOR ZHES BYA BA GNYIS KA'ANG NAN TAN CHEN PO'I GSUNG GIS YANG YANG 'DI LTA BU'I ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA NGOR KHRAL DU KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS THA SHAL BA, NYON MONGSKYI BRAN DU KHOL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS, ,SA SKYA PAn CHEN GYI LAS TSOGS LA BRTEN NAS BSGRIGS PAR BGYIS PA 'DIR DGE BA YIN NO, ,DE YIS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS DANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU'I SKU TSE'I RGYAL MTSAN BRTAN PA DANG, BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BSKUL BA PO SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS DANG MTHAR THUG GI PHYI NANG GI 'GEGS DANG BRAL NAS PHAN PA DANG BDE BA CHEN PO 'BYUNG RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
